attributes.background: bad girls is one of the best tv shows ever made and should be put back on tv and the two hour special about nikki and helen maureen and anne wanted to make,(the writers). the show was a comfort to people all around the world and people really related to the show and all the issues surrounding it. it gave people inspiration and a light amoungst the darkness. it sounds really cheesey but its true it was so impacting on life and hope and was originally started to raise awareness of what prison life is like in a womens prison.it has changed my life dramatically, i know you probally think how can a tv show do that? but it was good and emotive its just amazing.
